hero_description: Full-stack developer building [products](/projects) that look great and scale well.
about_me_paragraph_1: I'm a full-stack developer focused on crafting elegant user experiences and reliable backend systems. With expertise in [Next.js](https://nextjs.org), [React](https://react.dev), [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/), and backend services, I ship end-to-end features from idea to production.
about_me_paragraph_2: I enjoy solving complex problems across UI, APIs, and infrastructure, and I care deeply about performance, DX, and product polish. I'm also an AI engineer, building in the AI and DeFi space with a strong focus on real-world impact.
contact_description: Want to build something together? Hit me up on [Email](mailto:ritikjaiswal148@gmail.com) or [X](https://x.com/RitikJa62967785). Let's create something that doesn't end up in the GitHub graveyard.
meta_description: Full-stack developer specializing in UI/UX, AI, and DeFi. Building elegant products with Next.js, React, TypeScript, and scalable backends.
